summary: WHEN I STARTED TURNING THE STEERING WHEEL A FEW DAYS AGO I WOULD HEAR SOMETHING KINDA TICKING LIKE SOMETHING WAS CAUGHT BETWEEN THE STEERING AND COLUMN SECTION.  TODAY AFTER I STARTED MY CAR AND THE STEERING WHEEL AIR BAG CAME AND HAS STAYED ON. THUS MY HORN AND BUTTONS TO CONTROL MY INSTRUMENT PANEL NO LONGER WORK.
